response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds an intrinsic worth of $12,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am extending you an exclusive offer to acquire this item at a special price of $11,500. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties receive a fair deal while maximizing the value for you. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 11500}
